conference_notes: All panelists exposed, combining data is the main pillar of open data, the basis. To establish a global network is overriding.
name: Connecting the Dots: Aligning Local Initiatives with National Open Data Programmes and Global Goals
info: The title of this conference, "Connecting the dots" is very accurate. Connecting the dots seem like a puzzle that ultimately creates an object. In this session, the speakers will talk about open data on a local level, national level and global level and why it is very important to relate and join them.

tweets.content: @GlobalIntegrity: Excited to learn how the @opendatacharter is connecting the dots between global principles and local practices. #IODC16 #OpenDataCharter

session.description: Connecting the dots: Aligning local initiatives with national open data programmes and global goals
